#Text=Tenzin says : " No one 's fighting !
#Text=" Bumi says : " Hah !
#Text=Relax ... I 'd pay money to see that .
#Text=Maybe I 'll tag along just to see " Vacation Tenzin " .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " You 're not invited .
#Text=" Korra says : " Before we go on your dad 's study trip , we 're gon na have some real fun in my home town at the Glacier Spirits Festival .
#Text=They 've got rides , games , and all kinds of fried food on sticks .
#Text=" Tenzin 's children says : " Yay !
#Text=" Bumi says : " Yep .
#Text=There 's Vacation Tenzin .
#Text=And you ca n't stop me from going to the festival , Mom already invited me .
#Text=" Mako says : " So I walk up and say : " Looks like you had some car trouble .
#Text=Mako says : " Yeah !
#Text=Or , " when you get to jail , tell 'em Mako sent ya " .
#Text=" Korra says : " Ooh , I like that one .
#Text=" Mako says : " Okay , I 'll use that next time .
#Text=Beifong says if I keep it up , I could make detective soon .
#Text=" Korra says : " That sounds so fun .
#Text=All I do is train all day .
#Text=It 's like Tenzin 's totally forgotten how I beat Amon .
#Text=" Mako says : " Tenzin 's just trying to help you become the best Avatar you can be .
#Text=" Korra says : " Of course you 'd take his side !
#Text=" Mako says : " I 'm not taking his side , I 'm just ... " Korra says : " I 'm gon na take a walk .
#Text=" Mako says : " Why is it so much easier to bust triads than it is to get through one conversation with my girlfriend ?
#Text="
